src:
Wisatawan Rela Ngantri untuk Foto Selfie di Jembatan Kaca
03 Nov 2019, 19:51 by arif rahman


Wisatawan Rela Ngantri untuk Foto Selfie di Jembatan Kaca

KBRN,Slawi: Salah satu tujuan wisata di akhir pekan bagi sejumlah wisatawan nusantara , satu diantaranya obyek wisata guci yang berada di kaki gunung Slamet, dan berada di Kabupaten Tegal.
Walaupun guci sudah di kenal oleh seluruh wisatawan nusantara bahkan mancanegara dengan wisata air panasnya, obyek wisata guci saat ini juga ada wahana destinasi wisata The Baron Hill Of Guci , dengan jembatan kaca yang extrem , dengan ketinggian diatas bukit. 
Seperti yang terlihat  di Minggu (3/11/2019) pagi tadi, puluhan lebih wisatawan rela menunggu antrian untuk menikmati alam guci dari atas jembatan kaca , walaupun hujan gerimis para wisatawan tetap antusias berada di lokasi jembatan kaca. 
Salah satu wisatawan asal Cirebon Yutara (43) kepada RRI mengatakan dengan adanya spot untuk selfie di The Baron Hill Of Guci ,semakin menarik wisatawan , dirinya juga baru tahu di atas pancuran tiga belas spot destinasi wisata baru. 
Yutara menambahkan untuk jalan setapak menuju The Baron Hill Of Guci, perlu ada penambahan pengamanan ,sehingga wisatawan akan nyaman. 
Sementara itu Imam menyatakan untuk area sekitar destinasi wisata menuju The Baron Hill Of Guci, akan ada penambahan pengaman dan perbaikan jalan yang menuju lokasi jembatan kaca, terutama di jalan setapak, untuk nyaman wisatawan yang akan menikmati wisata baik jembatan kaca ,ayunan yang menantang uji nyali ,disamping sebelas lokasi foto selfie lainnya," ujarnya.
text:
Travelers are willing to take selfies for selfies on the glass bridge
03 Nov 2019, 19:51 by arif rahman


Travelers are willing to take selfies for selfies on the glass bridge

KBRN, Slawi: One of the weekend destinations for a number of archipelago tourists, one of which is the urn tourist object at the foot of Mount Slamet, and is in Tegal Regency.
Although the jar has been known by all archipelago tourists and even foreign tourists with hot water tourism, the current urn tourism object is also a vehicle for the Baron Hill Of Guci tourist destination, with an extreme glass bridge, with a height on the hill.
As seen on Sunday (3/11/2019) this morning, dozens of more tourists were willing to wait in line to enjoy the urn nature from the glass bridge, even though drizzling rain the tourists remained enthusiastic about being at the location of the glass bridge.
One tourist from Cirebon Yutara (43) told RRI that with the spot for a selfie at The Baron Hill Of Guci, the more attractive the tourists, he also just found out in the shower of thirteen new tourist destination spots.
Yutara added that for the path to The Baron Hill Of Guci, there needs to be additional security, so that tourists will be comfortable.
Meanwhile Imam said that for the area around the tourist destination to The Baron Hill Of Guci, there will be additional safety and improvement of the road leading to the location of the glass bridge, especially on the footpath, to comfort tourists who will enjoy the tour both the glass bridge, a swing that challenges the guts test , besides eleven other selfie photo locations, "he said.
